annotation: <history><entry><input>ssh user@ubuntu-vm</input><output>Welcome to Ubuntu 22.04 LTS</output><annotation>Connecting to an Ubuntu 22.04 virtual machine via SSH.</annotation></entry><entry><input>lsb_release -a</input><output>Distributor ID: Ubuntu Description:    Ubuntu 22.04 LTS Release:        22.04 Codename:       jammy</output><annotation>Checking the version and codename of the Ubuntu distribution using `lsb_release`.</annotation></entry><entry><input>sudo apt update</input><output>Get:1 http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu jammy InRelease [270 kB] ... Fetched 270 kB in 1s (498 kB/s) Reading package lists... Done</output><annotation>Updating the package index using `apt update`.</annotation></entry><entry><input>sudo apt install -y wget</input><output>Reading package lists... Done Building dependency tree       Reading state information... Done The following additional packages will be installed: ca-certificates ...</output><annotation>Installing `wget` to download files from the internet using the terminal.</annotation></entry><entry><input>wget https://www.example.com</input><output>--2024-11-14 12:35:45--  https://www.example.com/ Resolving www.example.com (www.example.com)... 93.184.216.34 Connecting to www.example.com (www.example.com)|93.184.216.34|:443... connected. HTTP request sent, awaiting response... 200 OK Length: 1256 (1.2K) [text/html] Saving to: ‘index.html’</output><annotation>Successfully downloading the webpage using `wget`.</annotation></entry><entry><input>cat index.html</input><output><!doctype html> ...</output><annotation>Viewing the contents of the downloaded HTML file.</annotation></entry><entry><input>sudo apt install -y vim</input><output>Reading package lists... Done Building dependency tree       Reading state information... Done The following additional packages will be installed: vim-common ...</output><annotation>Installing `vim` text editor on the system using `apt`.</annotation></entry><entry><input>vim --version</input><output>VIM - Vi IMproved 8.2 (2019 Dec 12, compiled May  1 2024 05:23:00) Included patches: 1-10 ...</output><annotation>Verifying the installation of `vim` by checking its version.</annotation></entry><entry><input>exit</input><output></output><annotation>Exiting the SSH session after completing the tasks.</annotation></entry></history>
